function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Existing criteria do not address virus propagation prevention","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission in built environments","Mitigation":"Update criteria to include virus propagation prevention measures","Technologies":"Incorporate air filtration systems, antimicrobial surfaces, and ventilation systems","People":"Occupants and visitors of built environments","Owner":"Building certification organizations and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Partial order assigned due to lack of virus propagation prevention measures","Impact":"Incomplete implementation of measures to prevent contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Assign clear and specific requirements for virus propagation prevention in building certification criteria","Technologies":"Utilize sensor-based monitoring systems and smart building technologies","People":"Architects, engineers, and building designers","Owner":"Building certification organizations and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of thermal comfort in virus propagation prevention","Impact":"Decreased effectiveness of measures to control contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Integrate thermal comfort guidelines with virus propagation prevention strategies","Technologies":"Smart HVAC systems, energy-efficient building materials, and natural ventilation designs","People":"Building occupants and facility managers","Owner":"Architects, engineers, and building designers"}]}
